member.name: MULTICAST_MODE_TYPE
member.summary: The MULTICAST_MODE_TYPE enumeration specifies the filter mode for multicast group addresses.

member.name: MULTICAST_MODE_TYPE.MCAST_INCLUDE
member.summary: The filter contains a list of IP addresses to include.

member.name: MULTICAST_MODE_TYPE.MCAST_EXCLUDE
member.summary: The filter contains a list of IP addresses to exclude.
